home.subtitleDescription: From now on you will never forget anything and your life will be easier. Add, edit and delete items you need to buy with just one click.

theVirtualShoppingList.subtitle: The VIRTUAL shopping list
theVirtualShoppingList.description: With this application you can make convenient and easy shopping lists. You can modify them at any time adding, editing and removing items.

shareYourLists.subtitle: Share lists with your friends!
shareYourLists.description: Do you have to organize a party and you have to make a list of what to buy? Make it using our app! You will have your list ready and easy to share with whoever you want in seconds!

remindWhatToBuy.subtitle: It reminds you when to shop!
remindWhatToBuy.description: You won't have anymore the problem of remembering when to shop because our wonderful app will notify you whenever you are near a supermarket!

home.buildYouTooYourListPhrase: Build you too your shopping list

login.goToRegisterLink: Not registered yet? Create a new account

emailSent.title: Almost done!
emailSent.description: We've just sent an email with the activation link. Click it to enable your account!

recoverPassword.goToLoginLink: Did you remember the password? Login here
recoverPassword.accountNotFound: Email address not found in our database.

emailSent.title: Check your inbox
emailSent.description: We've just sent you an email with a link to reset your password.

inviteToSubscribe.title: Unlock all the features!
inviteToSubscribe.share: Share lists and chat woth your friends
inviteToSubscribe.customize: Add or create custom products with your images
inviteToSubscribe.moreLists: Manage more lists to get more organized

confirmEmail.loginSuggestion: Now you can login into your account
confirmEmail.error: There has been an error while verifying your email address.

errors.atLeastOneNumber: Password must contains at least one number.
errors.atLeastOneSymbol: Password must contains at least one symbol (#, $, @, !, %, &, *, ?).
errors.atLeastSixCharacters: Password must be at least six characters long.
